name: Formalist: Progressive Design Linter
description:
QA for your designs!


Try out the demo project to learn more about plugin!

Note: duplicate the file from the link above to your drafts to try the plugin


Spend less on checking, earn more on automation. Save form 3 to 10 hours monthly on finding issues in your design.

This plugin looks for common mistakes in Figma designs. Select frames you need to check, open the plugin and start scan. It makes it extremely easy to find and correct small but important errors like object's fractional coordinates or missing the color style. 


In free mode you will have these checks for 5 free scans:

  • The object doesn't use the style in the font, fill, stroke, effects
  • Fonts less than 12px
  • Fractional coordinates and size
  • The default name of the object, property, or variant
  • Something's wrong with the component or the instance
  • The parent component was deleted
  • Too much Auto-layouts
  • Missing ".base" in component's name
  • Empty auto-layout in a component
  • Using different colors or fonts in the same text box


After 5 scans only these checks will be available:

  • Fonts less than 12px
  • Fractional coordinates
  • Fractional size
  • Default names


Business mode. Subscribe «Pro»‎ or «Organisation»‎ plan to get custom checks for your needs. We are always willing to help you in saving your time.
